item.title: 父子俩因亚利桑那州体育中心项目失败在纽约被起诉
item.description: 一对父子在曼哈顿被起诉，他们被指控在亚利桑那州一家倒闭的体育场馆中欺诈投资者，给 Vanguard Group、AllianceBernstein 和其他市政债券投资者造成了 2 亿多美元的损失。【原文：A father-and-son team has been indicted in Manhattan on charges they defrauded investors in a failed Arizona sports complex, causing more than $200 million in losses for Vanguard Group, AllianceBernstein and other municipal bond investors.】

item.title: 美国将取消拜登时代规定的液化天然气项目出口的 7 年期限
item.description: 美国将于周三废除前总统乔-拜登政府颁布的一项政策，该政策要求液化天然气（LNG）项目在获得批准后七年内出口。【原文：The U.S. is slated on Wednesday to rescind a policy issued by the administration of former President Joe Biden that requires liquefied natural gas, or LNG, projects to export within seven years of getting approvals.】

item.title: 巴西商业银行首席执行官称，仅从 Banco Master 收购关键资产
item.description: 巴西利亚银行（BRB）首席执行官保罗-恩里克-科斯塔（Paulo Henrique Costa）周二在接受采访时说，政府控制的巴西利亚银行（BRB）经过数月谈判，才同意从同业银行 Banco Master 收购最健康、最具战略意义的资产。【原文：Government-controlled Banco de Brasilia (BRB) only agreed to acquire the healthiest and most strategically relevant assets from fellow lender Banco Master after months of negotiations, BRB CEO Paulo Henrique Costa said in a Tuesday interview.】

item.title: 加拿大和墨西哥领导人讨论对抗美国贸易行动的计划
item.description: 加拿大总理办公室表示，加拿大总理马克-卡尼周二与墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）就加拿大 "打击美国无理贸易行动 "的计划进行了会谈。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney spoke with Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum on Tuesday about Canada's plan to "fight unjustified trade actions" by the United States, the prime minister's office said.】

item.title: 影院集团呼吁延长电影在影院的放映时间
item.description: 电影院所有者正在大力推动延长电影在电影院的放映时间，然后再供观众在家中观看。【原文：Movie theater owners are making a new push to keep films in cinemas for a longer period before they are available for audiences to watch at home.】

item.title: 参议员称，在延长波音监管计划之前，FAA 必须解决人们关注的问题
item.description: 民主党参议员玛丽亚-坎特韦尔（Maria Cantwell）周二敦促联邦航空管理局在决定是否延长允许波音公司执行联邦航空管理局授权任务（如检查和批准维修）的计划之前，先解决关键问题。【原文：Democratic Senator Maria Cantwell on Tuesday urged the Federal Aviation Administration to address critical concerns before deciding whether to extend a program that allows Boeing to perform FAA-delegated tasks like inspections and approving repairs.】

item.title: 就业信号减弱，物价走强，凸显美联储的潜在困境
item.description: 低迷的美国新就业数据和一份疲软的制造业报告凸显了美联储官员们新出现的担忧，即就业可能下滑，即使关税引发的一轮通胀风险限制了他们对此采取任何措施的能力。【原文：Lackluster new U.S. jobs data and a weak report on manufacturing highlight an emerging concern among Federal Reserve officials that employment could slip even as the risk of a tariff-driven round of inflation limits their ability to do anything about it.】

item.title: 美国通胀掉期价格受关税短期影响较大，标示经济衰退风险
item.description: 被称为美国通胀掉期的金融衍生品投资者正在押注，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税将在短期内对消费者价格产生巨大影响，而随着经济衰退担忧的升级，这种影响将在未来几年内消退。【原文：Investors in financial derivatives called U.S. inflation swaps are betting that President Donald Trump's tariffs will have a hefty short-term impact on consumer prices that will recede in the next few years as recession concerns escalate.】

item.title: 消息人士称，AQR 资本管理公司多只基金第一季度回报率接近 10
item.description: 本周二，一位熟悉内情的消息人士称，亿万富翁投资者克里夫-阿斯内斯（Cliff Asness）的 AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）旗下多只基金在第一季度取得了正收益。【原文：Billionaire investor Cliff Asness's AQR Capital Management finished the first quarter with positive returns in several of its funds, said a source familiar with the matter on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家新闻消息人士称，特朗普正在准备增加武器出口的行政命令
item.description: 四位熟悉相关讨论的消息人士称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府正在计划一项行政命令，以放宽军事装备出口的管理规定，并可能最快于周二或周三宣布。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is planning an executive order that would ease rules governing exports of military equipment, and could announce it as soon as Tuesday or Wednesday, four sources familiar with the discussions said.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Andreessen Horowitz 正在洽谈帮助收购 TikTok 的中国所有者
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，美国风险投资公司安德森-霍洛维茨公司（Andreessen Horowitz）正在洽谈对 TikTok 的投资，这是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普领导的从中国所有者手中夺回这一流行视频应用控制权的努力的一部分。【原文：U.S. venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz is in talks to invest in TikTok as part of an effort led by President Donald Trump to wrest control of the popular video app from its Chinese owners, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: Hims & Hers 将在其远程医疗平台上销售礼来公司的 Zepbound 产品
item.description: 远程医疗公司 Hims & Hers Health 周一表示，计划在其平台上销售礼来公司的糖尿病和减肥药物。【原文：Telehealth firm Hims & Hers Health said on Monday it plans to sell Eli Lilly's diabetes and weight-loss drugs on its platform.】

item.title: Meta 公司人工智能研究主管将于五月离职
item.description: Meta Platforms 人工智能研究主管乔埃勒-皮诺（Joelle Pineau）计划离开公司，而此时这家科技巨头正在人工智能领域积极投资并展开竞争。【原文：Meta Platforms' head of artificial intelligence research, Joelle Pineau, plans to leave the company, at a time when the tech giant is aggressively investing and competing in the AI space.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，外包公司 WNS 有收购意向
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，市值 28 亿美元的技术外包服务公司 WNS Holdings 在吸引了包括凯捷在内的潜在收购方的收购兴趣后，正在探讨出售事宜。【原文：WNS Holdings , a technology outsourcing services firm with a market value of $2.8 billion, is exploring a sale after attracting acquisition interest from potential suitors including Capgemini , according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: CoreWeave 在第三个交易日升破首次公开募股价格
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 CoreWeave 的股价在周二上市交易的第三个交易日上涨了 17%，报 43.50 美元，高于 40 美元的首次公开发行价。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup CoreWeave's shares were up 17% at $43.50 on their third day of trading on Tuesday, above their initial public offering price of $40.】

item.title: 纽约时报》报道：中国汽车制造商东风汽车和长安汽车举行合并谈判
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，中国汽车制造商东风汽车和重庆长安汽车正在就合并业务进行前期讨论。【原文：Chinese automakers Dongfeng Motor and Chongqing Changan Automobile are in advance discussions to combine their operations, the New York Times reported on Tuesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉第一季度在意大利的新车销量下降 7%，尽管 3 月份销量猛增 51
item.description: 意大利交通部周二公布的数据显示，特斯拉在意大利的新车注册量在经历了上个月的暴跌后，于3月份出现大幅反弹，整个季度同比下降了7%。【原文：Tesla's new car registrations in Italy rebounded sharply in March after a plunge the previous month to stand down 7% year-on-year in the quarter as a whole, data from the Transport Ministry showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 瑞银向意大利工会通报计划裁减该国三分之一的工作岗位
item.description: 路透社查阅的文件显示，瑞士银行瑞银周二通知意大利工会，计划在意大利裁员 180 人，约占总裁员人数的三分之一。【原文：Swiss bank UBS informed unions in Italy on Tuesday of plans to cut 180 jobs, or around a third of the total, in the country, documents reviewed by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 研究表明，如果人工智能不会杀死你的公司，它只会让你的公司更强大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行在一次会议上提交的一份研究报告发现，如果一家公司能够经受住采用人工智能所带来的动荡，那么从长远来看，人工智能将有助于其蓬勃发展。【原文：If a company can survive the upheaval caused by the adoption of artificial intelligence, AI will help it thrive in the longer run, a study presented at a European Central Bank conference has found.】

item.title: 丰田第一季度美国汽车销量增长近 1
item.description: 丰田汽车公司北美分公司周二公布，受皮卡和豪华车型需求的推动，第一季度美国汽车销量增长了约 1%。【原文：Toyota Motors' North American unit reported a rise of about 1% in first-quarter U.S. vehicle sales on Tuesday, fueled by demand for its pickup trucks and luxury models.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：梅赛德斯考虑因特朗普关税问题撤下美国入门级汽车
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二援引消息人士的话报道称，梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group）正在考虑从美国撤出价格最低的汽车，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的汽车关税可能会损害这些汽车的销售。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group is considering withdrawing its least expensive cars from the U.S. as President Donald Trump's auto tariffs would potentially harm their sales, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 汽车制造商与英国反垄断监管机构就竞争法案件达成和解
item.description: 英国竞争与市场管理局（Competition and Markets Authority）周二表示，包括宝马和福特在内的十家汽车制造商以及两个行业机构已与英国竞争监管机构达成和解，承认在汽车回收方面违反了竞争法，将支付 7770 万英镑（约合 1.0043 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：Ten car manufacturers, including BMW and Ford , and two trade bodies have reached a settlement with the UK's competition regulator to pay 77.7 million pounds ($100.43 million) in a fine after admitting to breaking competition law in relation to vehicle recycling, Competition and Markets Authority said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 对冲基金如何为特朗普的 "解放日 "布局
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的数据显示，在本周美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布对等关税之前，对冲基金已经缩减了风险押注，转而寻求安全。【原文：Hedge funds have scaled back risky bets and sought safety, data from Goldman Sachs shows, ahead of this week's widely anticipated announcement by U.S. President Donald Trump on reciprocal tariffs that has fuelled trade war fears.】

item.title: 大陆集团：第一季度北美轻型汽车产量可能下降 7
item.description: 德国汽车供应商大陆集团（Continental AG）周二表示，预计第一季度北美地区的轻型汽车产量将下降约 7%，原因是在即将对该行业征收关税之前存在 "经济不确定性"。【原文：Continental AG expects production of light vehicles in North America to fall by around 7% in the first quarter, the German auto supplier said on Tuesday, citing "economic uncertainty" ahead of looming tariffs on the sector.】

item.title: 普拉克明工厂扩建，3 月份美国液化天然气出口激增
item.description: 根据美国液化天然气公司（LSEG）的初步数据，美国 3 月份的液化天然气（LNG）出口量创下历史新高，销售了超过 900 万公吨的超冷天然气。【原文：The U.S. exported a record amount of liquefied natural gas (LNG) in March, selling more than 9 million metric tons (MT) of the superchilled gas, according to preliminary data from LSEG.】

item.title: 通用汽车第一季度美国汽车销量增长近 17
item.description: 通用汽车公司周二公布，受皮卡和经济型跨界 SUV 需求的推动，第一季度美国汽车销量增长了约 17%。【原文：General Motors reported an about 17% rise in first-quarter U.S. sales on Tuesday, helped by demand for its pickup trucks and affordable crossover SUVs.】

item.title: 瑞典将购买四架巴西航空工业公司货机
item.description: 瑞典政府周二表示，计划与荷兰和奥地利达成协议，从巴西航空工业公司购买四架 C-390 运输机，用于瑞典军队。【原文：Sweden's government said on Tuesday it plans to buy four C-390 transport planes from Embraer for its military, via an agreement with the Netherlands and Austria.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空客 3 月份交付了约 70 架喷气式飞机，同比增长 11
item.description: 业内消息人士周二称，空中客车公司 3 月份交付了约 70 架飞机，比前一个月的 40 架大幅增加，比去年 3 月份增加了约 11%。【原文：Airbus delivered about 70 planes in March, industry sources said on Tuesday, up sharply from 40 in the previous month and up about 11% from March last year.】

item.title: 意大利咖啡制造商伊利警告关税将推高美国咖啡价格
item.description: 意大利高端咖啡制造商 Illycaffe 公司首席执行官克里斯蒂娜-斯科奇亚（Cristina Scocchia）周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府本周将对该公司征收任何关税，该公司将被迫提高价格。【原文：Italian premium coffee maker Illycaffe' will be forced to raise prices in response to any tariffs imposed this week by U.S. President Donald Trump's administration, its CEO Cristina Scocchia said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟建议放宽汽车制造商二氧化碳排放目标规则
item.description: 根据欧盟委员会周二公布的一项软化规则的提案，汽车制造商将有三年而不是一年的时间来达到欧盟规定的 2025 年轿车和货车二氧化碳排放目标。【原文：Automakers are set to get three years, rather than one, to comply with the EU's 2025 CO2 emissions targets for cars and vans under a proposal to soften the rules, published by the European Commission on Tuesday.】
